Comment: **BREAKING:** Former President Donald Trump has removed Doug Emhoff, the husband of Vice President Kamala Harris, from the U.S. Holocaust Memorial Council. In a surprising move, Trump has announced he is appointing musician and fashion designer Kanye West as Emhoff's replacement.  This decision is already drawing strong reactions across the political spectrum, given West’s previous controversies involving antisemitic remarks. The Trump campaign has not yet responded to requests for comment.  More updates as the story develops.

Comment: A literal specialized genie could come down and visit him and promise to fix every problem the United States (or world at large) has ever had like no world hunger, no wars, no sickness or tragedy or horrors and everyone could live happy lives without any consequences but with one ask in return: to say Biden wasn’t so bad really  And he’d still say no. Not only because he doesn’t care about those things for people but because it’s just too hard for him to let go of a grievance. It’s pathetic and frankly disturbing, one genuinely has to wonder what’s gone wrong mentally up there to be *so* obsessed with grudges
Author: Lostsock1995
